ygData.subject: Original Tunic and Stat Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a monk on Povar and have two questions. I still have my original guild tunic. Is there any reason to save this or can i destroy it. Someone told me it
ygData.messageBody:
I play a monk on Povar and have two questions.

I still have my original guild tunic. Is there any reason
to save this or can i destroy it. Someone told me it might
be needed later to finish a quest. Anyone know?

Secondly - Is agility tantamount to our success? I have
been using Dervish rings +2 dex and yesterday bought a
+2 agility ring. Should i be looking into more agility
items?

Thanks.

Ghoti 7th circle monk of Povar.
